text: This is a list of State Register of Heritage Places in the Town of Bassendean, Western Australia. The State Register of Heritage Places is maintained by the Heritage Council of Western Australia. As of 2020, 334 places are heritage- listed in the Town of Bassendean, of which 13 are on the State Register of Heritage Places. ==List== The Western Australian State Register of Heritage Places, as of 2020, lists the following 13 state registered places within the Town of Bassendean: {| class="wikitable sortable" !Place name !Place # !Street number !Street name !Suburb or town !Co-ordinates !class="unsortable"|Notes & former names !class="unsortable"|Photo |- | Daylesford, Bassendean || || 7 || Daylesford Road || Bassendean || || Yadgawine, Cyril Jackson's House || |- | Earlsferry || || 1 || Earlsferry Crescent || Bassendean || || Briarsleigh || 140px |- | Bassendean Fire Station (former) || || 10-14 || Parker Street || Bassendean || || || |- | Pensioner Guard Cottage || || 1 || Surrey Street || Bassendean || || 'The Retreat', Old Pensioner's Cottage || 140px |- | Bassendean Oval || || 140 || Old Perth Road || Bassendean || || Bassendean Recreation Reserve, Steel Blue Oval, Bill Walker Stand & MacDonald Stand || 140px |- | VR 1876 Post Box, Bassendean || || || Surrey Street || Bassendean || || Town Pillar Box || 140px |- | Success Hill Lodge || || 1 || River Street || Bassendean || || Lockridge Private Hospital, Lockridge Hotel, Miss Baileys Girls High School, Riverside Lodge || |- | Guildford Road Bridge || || || Guildford Road || Bassendean || || MRWA 910, Bassendean Bridge, Guildford Road Bridge over Swan River || 140px |- | Bassendean Masonic Lodge (former) || || 25 || Wilson Street || Bassendean || || West Guildford Masonic Lodge || 140px |- | Basssendean Oval Entrance Gate || || 1 || West Road || Bassendean || || || 140px |- | Bassendean Oval Grandstand || || 1 || West Road || Bassendean || || || |- | MacDonald Grandstand || || 1 || West Road || Bassendean || || || |- | Red Post Boxes Group || || || || Kalgoorlie, Busselton, Bassendean || || || 140px |} ==References== Bassendean
